amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 116-42 to include findings that recognizes the fundamental priority of safeguarding food security and ending hunger, and the particular vulnerabilities of food production systems to the adverse impacts of climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Meng.
